Name: amh-muhammedsadiqan-lad
Author: Muhammed Sadiq And Muhammed Sani Habib

Translations.Text: inide zeyiti ātela newi፡፡ behodochi wisit’i yemīfela sīẖoni፡፡
yazuti፤ wede gehānemi mekakelimi beḫāyili gotituti፡፡
kezīyami «kerasu belayi kefela wiha sik’ayi ānibwabubeti፡፡»
t’inik’uk’ochu be’irigit’i bets’et’itenya menorīya wisit’i nachewi፡፡
fīti lefīti yetek’it’ach’u ẖonewi kesisi ḥārina kewefirami ḥāri yilebisalu፡፡
(negeru) inidezīhu newi፤ ‘ayinamawochi yeẖonuni nech’ach’i sētochimi inat’enadachewaleni፡፡
be’iriswami wisit’i yetemamenu ẖonewi፤ kefirafirē hulu yazizalu፡፡
yefītenyayituni moti iniji (dagimenya) be’iriswa wisit’i motini āyik’emisumi፡፡ yegehāneminimi k’it’ati (ālahi) t’ebek’achewi፡፡
kegētahi beẖone chirota (t’ebek’achewi)፡፡ yihi irisu talak’i ‘idili newi፡፡
(k’uri’anuni) bek’wanik’wahimi yageranewi (ḥizibochihi) yigenezebu zenidi bicha newi፡፡
